SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Server.Messages

Class SavedGameMessage

java.lang.Object
Server.Messages.SavedGameMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ToClientMessage, ToServerMessage
public class SavedGameMessage extends Object implements Serializable, ToServerMessage, ToClientMessage
Message to ask the server to join a saved game and to notify the client with the game data
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SavedGameMessage

      public SavedGameMessage(String id, String name)
      ToServer constructor
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the client
      name - the name of the player the client wants to reconnect to

    • SavedGameMessage

      public SavedGameMessage(String name, List<AchievementCard> commonAchievements, Deck<GoldCard> goldDeck, Deck<ResourceCard> resourceDeck, AchievementCard secretAchievement, List<Card> hand, int turn, List<Player> players, Chat chat)
      ToClient constructor
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      commonAchievements - the common achievements
      goldDeck - the gold deck
      resourceDeck - the resource deck
      secretAchievement - the secret achievement of the player
      hand - the hand of the player
      turn - the current game turn
      players - the list of players
      chat - the chat messages
